creatorText: Hello Gumroad community :) - I'm Phil Wornath, the creator of AI Summary Helper. As an enthusiast of in-depth online content, particularly scientific articles, I often struggled with time constraints. This inspired me to create a tool that boosts productivity and enhances reading efficiency.
whyHelperList: Reclaim Your Time: Generate quick digests or prepare for deeper dives later.
Tailored to You: Customize summaries to align with your language, profession, or perspective.
Stay Organized: Reduce cluttered tabs and manage your reading list effectively.
Enhanced Reading Experience: Focus on content that matters without feeling overwhelmed.
getStartedText: To begin using AI Summary Helper, ensure you have your OpenAI API key and enough credit. Join us in simplifying web reading for everyone. Download now on Gumroad and transform your browsing experience.
feedbackSupportText: Weâ€™re excited to have you try AI Summary Helper and look forward to your feedback and questions. Together, let's make web reading simpler and more enjoyable. Enhance your online reading experience with AI Summary Helper today!
